title: Date of the contract
explanation: The contract date is explicitly stated as 'dated as of March 6, 2008' in the introductory paragraph.

title: Party A
explanation: Party A is explicitly named as 'Wells Fargo Bank, N.A.' in the introductory paragraph.

title: party_B
explanation: Party B is explicitly named as 'Barnes Group Inc.' in the introductory paragraph.

title: Specified entity Party A
explanation: Text explicitly states 'None' for Specified Entity in relation to Party A for all listed sections.

title: Specified entity Party B
value: Subsidiaries, as defined in the Credit Agreement; Significant Subsidiaries, as defined in the Credit Agreement
explanation: Text specifies 'Subsidiaries, as defined in the Credit Agreement' and 'Significant Subsidiaries, as defined in the Credit Agreement' for Party B in the respective sections.

title: Specified transaction scope
explanation: The text states that 'Specified Transaction' has the meaning specified in Section 14, indicating the standard definition per Section 14, thus 'STD'.

title: Cross default applicable parties
explanation: The text states that the Cross-Default provisions apply to Party A and Party B.

title: Specified indebtness includes borrowed_money
explanation: The text does not mention borrowed money as included in Specified Indebtedness; only deposits are explicitly excluded.

title: Specified indebtness excludes deposits
explanation: The text explicitly states that Specified Indebtedness shall not include deposits and obligations in respect of deposits received in the ordinary course of Party A's banking business.

title: amount for Party A
explanation: Threshold amount for Party A is expressed as a percentage, not a fixed amount.

title: currency for Party A
explanation: No currency specified for Party A threshold amount; it is a percentage of Shareholders Equity.

title: percentage for Party A
explanation: Party A threshold amount is 3% of Shareholders Equity as stated in the text.

title: percentage reference for Party A
explanation: Percentage reference for Party A is Shareholders Equity as explicitly stated.

title: amount for Party B
explanation: Party B threshold amount is $20,000,000 for Specified Indebtedness other than that owing to Party A.

title: currency for Party B
explanation: Currency inferred as USD from the dollar sign ($) used in the text.

title: percentage for Party B
explanation: No percentage threshold amount specified for Party B; amounts are fixed dollar values.

title: percentage reference for Party B
explanation: No percentage reference applicable for Party B as no percentage threshold is specified.

title: Credit Event Upon Merger  applicable parties
explanation: The text explicitly states that the 'Credit Event Upon Merger' provisions apply to Party A and Party B.

title: Automatic Early Termination  applicable parties
explanation: Text explicitly states that the Automatic Early Termination provision will not apply to Party A or Party B.

title: Termination Currency
explanation: The text defines 'Termination Currency' as United States Dollars, which corresponds to the ISO code USD.

title: Email for notices for Party A
explanation: No email address provided for Party A; only physical addresses and phone/fax numbers are given.

title: Email for notices for Party B
explanation: No email address provided for Party B; only physical addresses and fax numbers are given.

title: Process agent for party A
explanation: Text explicitly states Party A will not appoint a Process Agent.

title: Name of process agent for party A
explanation: No Process Agent appointed for Party A, so no name provided.

title: Address of process agent for party A
explanation: No Process Agent appointed for Party A, so no address provided.

title: Process agent for party B
explanation: Text explicitly states Party B will not appoint a Process Agent.

title: Name of process agent for party B
explanation: No Process Agent appointed for Party B, so no name provided.

title: Address of process agent for party B
explanation: No Process Agent appointed for Party B, so no address provided.

title: Party A is a Multibranch party
explanation: Text explicitly states 'Party A is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party A offices
explanation: No offices information provided as Party A is not a Multibranch Party.

title: Party B is a Multibranch party
explanation: Text explicitly states 'Party B is not a Multibranch Party.'

title: Party B offices
explanation: No offices information provided as Party B is not a Multibranch Party.

title: Party for calculation agent
explanation: Text states 'The Calculation Agent is Party A, unless Party A is a Defaulting Party', so default calculation agent is Party A.

title: Governing Law
explanation: The text explicitly states the agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.
